Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about this is a conversation about Isabella and Klaus discussing a proposed messaging feature and scheduling a meeting with Maria to further discuss and implement it @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Hey Klaus, I just finished reporting bugs to Maria. Did you come across any issues while checking your emails?
Yes, I found a couple of bugs while checking my emails. Let me show you what I discovered.
Thank you for showing me the bugs. I will report them to Maria as well.
Is there anything else you need help with?
Yes, actually I have a feature request that I wanted to discuss with you.
Sure, I'm all ears. What feature request do you have?
I would like to propose adding a messaging feature that allows customers to send feedback directly to the maintainer.
That sounds like a great idea! Direct customer feedback can be really valuable. I think we can definitely consider adding that feature. Let's discuss it further and see how we can implement it.
We should schedule a meeting to discuss the details and brainstorm ideas for implementing the messaging feature.
Sure, when would you like to schedule the meeting?
How about we schedule the meeting for tomorrow afternoon?
Sounds good, let's schedule the meeting for tomorrow afternoon. What time works best for you?
2 PM tomorrow works for me. Let's meet at Hobbs Cafe. I will bring my laptop so that we can take notes and discuss the implementation in more detail.
Should we invite Maria to the meeting as well to get her input on the messaging feature?
Yes, we should definitely invite Maria to the meeting. Her input would be valuable in discussing and implementing the messaging feature.

Maria Lopez.description: leaving home and going to Hobbs Cafe @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating
